vehicles.title: 2017 Suzuki GSX-R1000
vehicles.detail: The King of Sportbikes. All-new from its sticky tires up, the GSX-R1000 exudes MotoGP influence.

vehicles.title: 2016 Ford B-MAX
vehicles.detail: The Ford B-MAX is a compact MPV with a multitude of technologies, developed especially to make driving easier.

vehicles.title: 2015 Honda CR-V
vehicles.detail: The 2015 Honda CR-V makes modest improvements to efficiency, safety and tech across the board, but faces very stiff competition from younger challengers.

vehicles.title: 2017 Swift Bessacarr 484
vehicles.detail: The 2017 Model Now in Stock Swift Bessacarr 484 Powered by the new Fiat Euro 6 2.3 litre, 130bhp turbo diesel engine, a 6 speed Manual gearbox.
